nodes.text: Momongs, also known as Trandoshan monkeys, were the colorful monkey-like creatures native to Trandoshan moon of Wasskah. They preyed on convorees. Once while Ahsoka Tano was on Wasskah, a certain momong tried and failed to kill the convorees outside the Padawan's base. Instead, two convorees picked him up and threw him off a tree limb. Babbo and Duppa were both momongs.
